description.value:
This tiny spark is almost invisible until it is fanned into life. When it is, its twin flame reignites as well.

Level: 10
Category: Alchemical Item
Time: 30 min.
Component Cost: See Alchemical Item
Formula Cost: 120 gp
Key Skill: Arcana or Nature

Property

To use this item's power, you must first link the item to another alchemical item in hand or in an adjacent square as a standard action. The level of the linked item must be the same as or lower than the level of the twinned flames.

Utility Power âœ¦ Consumable (Standard Action)

Effect: You activate the power of the linked alchemical item. You do not need to have line of effect to the item, but you must be within 1 mile of it.



Published in Mordenkainen's Magnificent Emporium, page(s) 135.
